Description: Painted sycomore fig(?) wood shabti of Astnefret with a black lappet-wig, a carved face with the eyes traced in black, a red collar enclosing the relief hands holding two representations of red hoes, the legs are inscribed with a single column of black painted hieroglyphs flanked by red lines, the foot is damaged.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
